price: зато, величај свога Господара и хвали Га, и буди од оних који Му се клањају,
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
